DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: An AI-powered Foundry VTT module for intelligent TTRPG assistance.

SETTINGS.TITLE: The Gold Box Settings
SETTINGS.BACKEND_STATUS_HINT: Current status of backend server (automatically detected)
SETTINGS.BACKEND_PASSWORD_HINT: Password for admin operations on backend server (used to sync settings)
SETTINGS.MAX_MESSAGE_CONTEXT_HINT: Number of recent chat messages to send to AI for context (default: 15)
SETTINGS.AI_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT_HINT: Maximum time to wait for AI response before re-enabling button (default: 60)
SETTINGS.AI_ROLE_HINT: What role AI should play in your game
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_PROVIDER_HINT: Provider name for General LLM (e.g., openai, anthropic, opencode, custom-provider)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_BASE_URL_HINT: Base URL for General LLM provider (e.g., https://api.openai.com/v1, https://api.z.ai/api/coding/paas/v4)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_MODEL_HINT: Model name for General LLM (e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022, openai/glm-4.6)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_VERSION_HINT: API version for General LLM (e.g., v1, v2, custom)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_TIMEOUT_HINT: Request timeout for General LLM in seconds (default: 30)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_MAX_RETRIES_HINT: Maximum retry attempts for General LLM (default: 3)
SETTINGS.GENERAL_LLM_CUSTOM_HEADERS_HINT: Custom headers for General LLM in JSON format (advanced)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_PROVIDER_HINT: Provider name for Tactical LLM (placeholder for future implementation)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_BASE_URL_HINT: Base URL for Tactical LLM provider (placeholder for future implementation)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_MODEL_HINT: Model name for Tactical LLM (placeholder for future implementation)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_VERSION_HINT: API version for Tactical LLM (e.g., v1, v2, custom)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_TIMEOUT_HINT: Request timeout for Tactical LLM in seconds (default: 30)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_MAX_RETRIES_HINT: Maximum retry attempts for Tactical LLM (default: 3)
SETTINGS.TACTICAL_LLM_CUSTOM_HEADERS_HINT: Custom headers for Tactical LLM in JSON format (advanced)

NOTES.DISCOVER_BACKEND: Test backend connection and discover server if port changed

CONNECTION.BACKEND_NOT_RUNNING: Backend Server Not Running or Not Reachable
CONNECTION.RUN_AUTOMATION: Run ./start-backend.py from The Gold Box module directory to automatically set up and start backend server.
CONNECTION.SEE_README: See README.md file for manual setup instructions.
CONNECTION.AUTO_DISCOVER: Go to The Gold Box settings and click "Discover Backend" to automatically find and connect to a running backend server.
CONNECTION.NOTE: Note: The frontend automatically discovers backend port. Use "Discover Backend" button if needed.
CONNECTION.CONFIGURE_API_KEYS: Please configure API keys in backend to use AI features.
CONNECTION.USE_KEY_MANAGER: Use key manager to add providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, or others.
CONNECTION.CONFIGURE_DESIRED: Configure your desired provider in The Gold Box settings.
CONNECTION.CHECK_CONNECTION: Please check your backend connection and settings.

ERRORS.CONNECTION_FAILED: Failed to connect to AI service
ERRORS.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before trying again.
ERRORS.SESSION_REQUIRED: Session required or expired. Please refresh the page.
ERRORS.BACKEND_NOT_FOUND: No backend server found on any port
ERRORS.REFRESH_FAILED: Session refresh failed after {failures} consecutive failures

MESSAGES.COLLECTING_CHAT: Collecting recent chat messages for AI context...
MESSAGES.CIRCUIT_BREAKER_OPEN: Circuit breaker opened due to repeated failures
MESSAGES.VISIBILITY_HIDDEN: Tab became hidden, adjusting refresh behavior
MESSAGES.VISIBILITY_VISIBLE: Tab became visible, checking session health
MESSAGES.HEALTH_CHECK_PASSED: Connection test passed on tab visibility
MESSAGES.HEALTH_CHECK_FAILED: Connection test failed on tab visibility, refreshing session
